meanings.definition: Engaged in fighting within a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The infought team members couldn't agree on a strategy.
meanings.sent2: The infought company struggled to reach a consensus.
meanings.sent3: The infought debate among the students led to a chaotic classroom.
meanings.sent4: The infought political party was tearing itself apart.
meanings.sent5: The infought atmosphere in the office made collaboration difficult.

meanings.definition: Characterized by internal conflict or struggle.
meanings.sent1: The infought family couldn't resolve their differences.
meanings.sent2: The infought relationship was filled with arguments.
meanings.sent3: The infought siblings bickered constantly over trivial matters.
meanings.sent4: The infought mind of the protagonist mirrored his external struggles.
meanings.sent5: The infought emotions within her were a constant source of turmoil.
